name: Just 5 More Minutes
description:
The weekend is here but life seems to be trying to do its damndest to wake you up early.  Act quickly to overcome the obstacles that threaten to fully wake you from your slumber.  Venture forth and get those previous five more minutes of sleepy glory.

You can use the mouse to look around, and there's prompts on screen of what key to press.

Mostly made as a joke, though I didn't manage to complete it unfortunately.   You have to restart the game after 10 seconds so beware of that.  Don't know if I'll manage to come back to this unfortunately.

YouTube gameplay video:



Also, I apparently still couldn't get the title screen background to properly display... cool.  Download to get the nice background in the title.

Background comes
